mapper.insert: INSERT INTO reservation ( item_category, total_price, start_date, end_date, name, phone, total_discount_price, member_id ) VALUES ( #{itemCategory}, #{totalPrice}, #{startDate}, #{endDate}, #{name}, #{phone}, #{totalDiscountPrice}, #{memberId} )
mapper.update: UPDATE reservation SET item_category = IFNULL( #{itemCategory}, item_category ), total_price = IFNULL( #{totalPrice}, total_price ), start_date = IFNULL( #{startDate}, start_date ), end_date = IFNULL( #{endDate}, end_date ), name = IFNULL( #{name}, name ), phone = IFNULL( #{phone}, phone ), total_discount_price = IFNULL( #{totalDiscountPrice}, total_discount_price ) WHERE res_id = #{resId}
